title: Please explain when the second round robin stage will occur. for worlds group stage???
body: I know worlds is a double round robin for the group stage. When i look at the schedule it says that knockout stages are next. So what im asking is when will the teams all be playing each other again??? Its not on the schedule anywhere.

replies.body: Same structure next week maybe the matches will be reversed in order

Not entirely the same if it is like the last few years.

Every group plays all of their games in one day including any tiebreakers.
Which from what I can understand will be the case this year in order (so group A plays first, followed by b/c/d).
If I remember correctly they don't necessarily stick to A-B-C-D order for whatever reason.
Group b is going first on Thursday

Thank god! Thanks for the swift reply. I just woke up and saw that TSM lost to flipping misfits!!!! As a TSM superfan my heart was crushed. I want to see them make it out of groups so bad, so to lose to EU like that really sucks. I still have high hopes they will smash misfits round two and hopefully Flash wolves picks up games off WE or Misfits.
